title: [Large-scale] Trends in Modern Medical Education Research and Flipped Learning Application Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical education theory and at least three years of clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: A tailored program for elementary education practitioners responsible for medical education, featuring VR simulations and BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) for hands-on learning.

learning_goals: Learners can explain 80% or more of the seven categories of recent research trends in medical education (technological advancements, learning outcomes improvement, societal aspects, etc.).
Learners can implement the flipped learning model in medical education scenarios with 90% accuracy in a simulated environment.
Learners can submit a customized educational design plan for learners in an actual VR environment within 72 hours through project-based assessment.

resources: Medical Education Research Trends Analysis Materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
